title: Who Killed Martin Hannett?: The Story of Factory Records' Musical Magician
description: 'The book on the magician is well overdue'Tony Wilson, Factory RecordsFactory Records co-founder, tortured genius, Martin 'Zero' Hannett created the soundtrack of a generation. The highestprofile producer of his era, he produced the Manchester greats (Buzzcocks, New Order, Joy Division etc.) and his influence resounds in today's top bands. Yet despite his talents, his life was as tragic and destructive as his work was innovative and creative. How did the 'magician' end up a pathetic, overweight junkie humiliatingly pushed around in a shopping trolley for a Happy Mondays video before his sad early death in 1991?In this original and fascinating biography - the first book on Hannett - Colin Sharp, best friend to Martin, takes us on a journey into the heart and soul of a sonic genius.
author: Colin Sharp
